target.name: method
target.summary: Provides an easy way to concatenate output members inside a or a type.
target.returns: A value indicating whether the method should be consumed by compiler, by implementing to-string method .

remarks.para: This method won't emit type name and curly brackets. If you want to customize emit text, you can only change values inside a pair of brackets.

member.exception: Throws when the argument is invalid.
